text: Fastlane (2015) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It was held on February 22, 2015 at FedExForum in Memphis, Tennessee. It was the first Fastlane event held by the WWE. The main event saw Roman Reigns defeat Daniel Bryan to keep his spot in the WWE World Heavyweight Championship main event match against Brock Lesnar at WrestleMania 31. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times 1 The Authority (Kane, Big Show and Seth Rollins) (with Jamie Noble and Joey Mercury) defeated Dolph Ziggler, Erick Rowan and Ryback Six-man tag team match 13:01 2 Goldust defeated Stardust Singles match 8:55 3 Tyson Kidd and Cesaro (with Natalya) defeated The Usos (Jimmy Uso and Jey Uso) (c) (with Naomi) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 9:33 4 Nikki Bella (c) (with Brie Bella) defeated Paige Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 5:34 5 Bad News Barrett (c) defeated Dean Ambrose by disqualification Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 7:58 6 Rusev (c) (with Lana) defeated John Cena by submission1 Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 16:45 7 Roman Reigns defeated Daniel Bryan Singles match for a WWE World Heavyweight Championship match at WrestleMania 31 22:51 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match 1Cena passed out in Rusev's finisher, The Accolade and the match's outcome was announced as a submission victory for Rusev. == References == ==Other websites== *Official Fastlane website Category:2015 in professional wrestling Category:History of Memphis, Tennessee Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2010s in Tennessee Category:2015 in the United States Category:February 2015 events
title: Fastlane (2015)
